onset.Description: The time in seconds from the beginning of the run at which each trial began.

duration.Description: The duration of each trial in seconds.

run.Description: The fMRI run in which the trial occurred.

image_number.Description: The name of the stimulus (or image number) presented in the trial. Because the same images occurred in both experimental conditions or trial types, this identifier can be used for item analyes.

trial_type.Description: The condition or trial type: whether the image was presented with calories (calorie image) or without calories (food image).

calories.Description: The number of kilocalories estimated for the food presented in the image.

text.Description: The text (e.g., food calories or arbitray image number) presented along with the stimulus image during the trial (which depended on the experimental condition or trial type).

participant_id.Description: ID number assigned to participant (prefix sub-).

weight_lbs.Description: Participant's weight in pounds as obtained by Tanita body composition scale.

BMI.Description: Participant's Body Mass Index (weight in kilograms / height in meters) as obtained by Tanita body composition scale.

bodyfat.Description: Participant's percentage body fat as estimated by Tanita body composition scale.

dieting_status.Description: Discrete categorization of participant's dieting status (non-dieter or dieter) as determined by their Restraint Scale Score (> 14 as Dieters, <= 14 Non-dieters).

concern_dieting.Description: Total score for the Concern for Dieting subscale of the Dietary Restraint Scale.

weight_fluctuation.Description: Total score for the Weight Fluctuation subscale of the Dietary Restraint Scale.

food_rating.Description: Ratings of  preference to eat the food presented on each trial (1 = not at all, 4 = very much). Missing values mean interpolated.
